description:
Jashin-chan continues to flee from debt collectors, this time ending up in the southern coastal town of Minamishimabara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iruka ni Notte Oosawagi! Harahara Dokidoki Minamishimabara!
Riding a Dolphin Into Chaos. Excitement and Thrills in Minamishimabara!
イルカにノって大騒ぎ! ハラハラドキドキ南島原!
